sourcesContent:
import { FaCheckCircle, FaTwitter } from "react-icons/fa"; const Services = () => { return (

Infrastructure

The company will position itself as one of the foremost contributors to Ugandan’s infrastructure development that is to say Mass Transit Transportations, supply of high-quality construction materials, Roads, and Highways, general civil engineering works. Basic infrastructure is essential to the post-down-turn economic revival. We strive to provide customers with the highest value added by using new advanced technology of construction in order to meet on-time delivery and quality projects.

Industrial

As it is well-known, reputation of a leading consultant and contractor in Uganda is about industrial projects including its experiences, the will benefit from the numerous industrial projects by using new construction technology and special skilled techniques. BWAP Construction company Limited will be leader in turn-key design and construction of ware houses, factories etc. With high quality people, bring excellent projects that represent the company’s achievement.

Building

Building is one of BWAP Construction company Limited services major works. The company has positioned itself to win a lot of building projects both private, non- governmental and in government sectors by focusing on each customer’s specific project requirements. We believe we can provide a better level of service and demonstrate desirable projects with satisfaction record. Our projects are Office buildings, Condominiums, Sport Auditorium, School buildings, Hospitals, private homes, Museums, Convention buildings etc.

Architectural Drawings

  • Commercial buildings which include Hotels, Suits, Malls.
  • Residential buildings.
  • School buildings which include classrooms, dormitories, and laboratories.
  • Hospital buildings
  • Office blocks of all kinds.

Civil and Structural Engineering

  • Designing structural drawings for buildings which include Hotels, Suits, Malls.
  • Roads, tunnel, bridges and earth works.
  • Building construction for high rise buildings and industrial plants.
  • Construction of housing estates.

Electrical Engineering

  • We are commitment to carry on high and low voltage power lines installation network. This will be done through sub-contracts that will be got from government and private investors
  • Building Electrical services- Electrical installation, fire alarm systems, security alarms, communication systems, computer network, audio and visual systems, access control units etc. for domestic, commercial, hospitals, industrial, hotel blocks
  • Solar installation
  • Power Audit
  • Designing Electrical drawings by using AutoCAD
  • Working on projects that require GIS software

Mechanical Engineering

  • Building Mechanical services- Air conditioning, fire fighting systems, Ventilation, Refrigeration systems, lifts, and Plumbing, Drainage, Water supply etc for domestic, commercial, hospitals, industrial, and hotel blocks
  • Water treatment and supply
  • Food processing
  • Any other related mechanical works
); }; export default Services;
